AG.notes: Holders of Caricom Certificate of Skills can stay indefinitely.

AU.notes: May apply online (Online Visitor e600 visa).

BB.notes: Holders of Caricom Certificate of Skills can stay indefinitely.

BJ.notes: Must have an international vaccination certificate.

CO.notes: 90 days - extendable up to 180-days stay within a one-year period

DM.notes: Holders of Caricom Certificate of Skills can stay indefinitely.

ET.notes: eVisa holders must arrive via Addis Ababa Bole International Airport

GA.notes: Electronic visa holders must arrive via Libreville International Airport.

GD.notes: Holders of Caricom Certificate of Skills can stay indefinitely.

GY.notes: Holders of Caricom Certificate of Skills can stay indefinitely.

IN.notes:
e-Visa holders must arrive via 26 designated airports or 3 designated seaports.
An Indian e-Tourist Visa can only be obtained twice in one calendar year.

JM.notes: Holders of Caricom Certificate of Skills can stay indefinitely.

KG.notes: Electronic visa holders must arrive via Manas International Airport or Osh Airport or through land crossings with China (at Irkeshtam and Torugart), Kazakhstan (at Ak-jol, Ak-Tilek, Chaldybar, Chon-Kapka), Tajikistan (at Bor-Dobo, Kulundu, Kyzyl-Bel) and Uzbekistan (at Dostuk).

KN.notes: Holders of Caricom Certificate of Skills can stay indefinitely.

LC.notes: Holders of Caricom Certificate of Skills can stay indefinitely.

VC.notes: Holders of Caricom Certificate of Skills can stay indefinitely.

SO.notes: Available at Bosaso Airport, Galcaio Airport and Mogadishu Airport.

LK.notes: Must hold return or onward ticket.

SR.notes: Holders of Caricom Certificate of Skills can stay indefinitely.

TT.notes: Holders of Caricom Certificate of Skills can stay indefinitely.

UZ.notes: 5-day visa free transit when in transit at the international airports on condition of holding a confirmed onward ticket for a flight to a third country.
